nodes.text: The Redhill province, also known simply as Redhill, was a rural province located on the planet Celwis. The province mainly belonged to the Xodlak family, and the rancher family of Xodlak'phr'ooa (Lakphro), Lakansu, and their daughter Lakris had a homestead there.

While attempting to lead the Chiss into a civil war, Haplif of the Agbui resided with Lakphro's family for a time in order to manipulate the Xodlak Councilor Xodlak'uvi'vil, who was in charge of local Xodlak family affairs. Councilor Lakuviv held his White Judgment Seat in Redhill's Redhill Hall.
